### Project Information

#### Publication

The results of this analysis will be published in [tjpalanca.com](http://www.tjpalanca.com), a data blog:

* [Part 1 - Election Fingerprints](http://tjpalanca.com/2016/05/on-elections-part-1.html) - statistical electoral fraud detection via voter turnout and votes for winning candidate.
